examples: He works as a professional artist.
The museum exhibits artwork from various artists.
O museu exibe obras de arte de vários artistas.

suggested: Why did the artist bring a pencil to bed? In case they had a sketchy dream!
Being an artist can be tough when your work is not appreciated or understood.
I get so angry when people dismiss art as mere 'scribbles' without appreciating the skill and creativity behind it.
Did you know that some artists use unconventional materials like coffee, food, or even trash to create their artworks?
The smell of oil paints in the studio is often associated with the work of an artist.
The tactile experience of sculpting clay or molding materials is an integral part of an artist's creative process.
Art has the power to connect people across cultures, languages, and generations, creating a sense of shared humanity.
